entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 08:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or blizzard. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
